test.common
Class Test

java.lang.Object
  test.common.Test
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class Test
extends java.lang.Object
implements jade.util.leap.Serializable

Common base class for all test classes designed to be executed within the JADE test suite framework

Author:
Giovanni Caire - TILAB
See Also:

Method Detail

load

public jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour load(jade.core.Agent a)
                                    throws TestException
Specific tests must re-define this method to perform test specific initializations and to create the Behaviour that will actually perform the test.

Parameters:
a - The agent that executes the test
Returns:
the Behaviour that will actually perform the test
Throws:
TestException

clean

public void clean(jade.core.Agent a)
Specific tests can re-define this method to perform test specific clean-up operations.

Parameters:
a - The agent that executes the test

getGroupArgument

protected final java.lang.Object getGroupArgument(java.lang.String key)
Retrieve an argument of the TestGroup this Test belongs to. Group arguments may be set at run-time by the user through the "Set arguments" button of the TestSuite Toolbar. When needed a TestGroup can also directly set group arguments from within its initialize() method. Group arguments are available to all tests in the same group.

Parameters:
key - The key identifying the group argument to be retrieved
Returns:
The value of the group argument identified by key

getTestArgument

protected final java.lang.String getTestArgument(java.lang.String key)
Retrieve an argument of this Test. Test arguments can be set within the xml configuration file describing this test by adding elements of type . Unlike group arguments, test arguments are only available to the test they refer to.

Parameters:
key - The key identifying the test argument to be retrieved
Returns:
The value of the test argument identified by key

setTimeout

protected void setTimeout(long t)
Specify a timeout for the test. If test execution does not complete within the specified timeout the test automatically fails.

passed

protected final void passed(java.lang.String msg)
Terminates the tests marking it as successful.

Parameters:
msg - A test completion message that is appended to the log.

failed

protected final void failed(java.lang.String reason)
Terminates the tests marking it as failed.

Parameters:
msg - An error message that is appended to the log and can be viewed in the test suite GUI.

isFailed

protected final boolean isFailed()
Returns:
true if this test has already been marked as failed by means of a call to the failed() method

log

protected final void log(java.lang.String s)
Log a given String

pause

protected final void pause()

enablePause

protected final void enablePause(boolean b)
